item.title: What do you need to hear in 40 years?
item.description:
What I’m going to need to hear in 40 years…. A collage of all the most important friends, family, and voices of a time when I was hosting a weekly show at Stanford. Credits: PBD Episode Creds New Episodes Every Sunday @Noon Ep 1 welcome to my sound library Humans (In Order of Appearance) Michael Betts, Host
Enoch Cincotta(singing) and Joey Lynch as prickly pear in first song https://pricklypair.

item.title: Healthier Choices
item.description:
PBD ep 2 Ep2 What are you trying to do before you die Pale Blue Dawt! or paleblue.fm (couldn’t afford keeping another website online)
Humans (In Order of Appearance)
Michael Betts Reineer Nick Kush, @kushberryjams Sean Keilan, the Provost of Porter College and Professor of Literature. //( random person private property )
